description: Clé primaire. Type d'action du médicament par exemple, agoniste, antagoniste.
Description de la façon dont le type d'action est utilisé
Regroupement de niveau supérieur des types d'action par exemple, action positive vs action négative

sample_rows.description: Binds to a substance such as a cell surface antigen, targetting a drug to that location, but not necessarily affecting the functioning of the substance itself
Binds to a metal, reducing its availability for further interactions
Induces cross-linking of proteins or nucleic acids
Destabilises or disrupts a protein complex, macromolecular assembly, cell membrane etc
Hydrolyses a substrate through enzymatic reaction
